extensionDescription.message: Super Lightweight User Script and Style Manager

autoUpdateIntervalDescription.message: Number of days between Updates (0 = no update)

errorSync.message:
Unable to sync
Storage ($1KB) is larger than 100KB. Sync will be turned off.

globalScriptExcludeMatchesDescription.message: Exclude Match pattens (one per line) to prevent all scripts from running on them.

'$1'

installConfirm.message:
Do you want to install '$1'?

Script/CSS name already exists.
Do you want to replace the existing one?

errorUpdate.message: Script/CSS does not have updateURL or version.

errorSize.message: File size is larger than the $1kb allowed
